body_html:
I agree it's a bad idea to pad data, but it'll be helpful to return a tensor of smaller batch.
For example, if we want to calculate accuracy on a validation set, each sample needs to be fetched before an OutOfRangeError is raised. In tensorpack we have a remainder=False option for this purpose.
body_text:
I agree it's a bad idea to pad data, but it'll be helpful to return a tensor of smaller batch.
For example, if we want to calculate accuracy on a validation set, each sample needs to be fetched before an OutOfRangeError is raised. In tensorpack we have a remainder=False option for this purpose.
body:
I agree it's a bad idea to pad data, but it'll be helpful to return a tensor of smaller batch.
For example, if we want to calculate accuracy on a validation set, each sample needs to be fetched before an OutOfRangeError is raised. In tensorpack we have a [`remainder=False` option](http://tensorpack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/modules/dataflow.html#tensorpack.dataflow.BatchData) for this purpose.
